item.title: Voice and Data Bandwidth for Hospitals
item.description: Healthcare facilities rely heavily on electronic communication to function effectively. This reliance is only expected to increase as technology advances and electronic record-keeping becomes more common. This naturally raises concerns about the rising costs associated with these growing telecom needs. However, there are ways to manage and even reduce these expenses. The most fundamental requirement for any organization is voice communication. For larger facilities, this typically involves a PBX phone system.
